resources.string: Unfortunately this device does not have support for Bluetooth 4.0 which is a critical hardware requirement and operations cannot persist without it.

Unfortunately this device does not have extended Bluetooth LE Support. While the software features necessary for advtecertising as a peripheral are available from Lollipop on, manufacturers must also use a Bluetooth chip-set that can support advertisement. This is a critical hardware requirement and operations cannot persist without it.

This Application uses Bluetooth Low Energy in order to pass messages and organize data transfer. Please Be aware that Bluetooth LE has much lower energy usage than classic Bluetooth or Wi-Fi and as such will not have as noticeable of an impact as the latter.
